1144680.name: Splitgate - Legendary Edition
1144680.description:
The Splitgate - Legendary Edition offers plenty of EXCLUSIVE Legendary and Epic cosmetics to use in the Splitgate Arena.

Included in the Splitgate - Legendary Edition
You'll get three EXCLUSIVE Legendary skins for the Rhino armor set, as well as the matching Jetpack skins. You will also receive the EXLUSIVE Epic Volt skin for all 11 weapons. Legendary Edition users also receive 800 Disco Balls, Splitgate's in-game currency, to use in the Item Shop.

Armors
- Rhino - Blazing (EXCLUSIVE Legendary)
- Rhino - Mr. Attitude (EXCLUSIVE Legendary)
- Rhino - Sharpened (EXCLUSIVE Legendary)



Weapons
EXLUSICE Epic Volt Skin for all 11 weapons



Jetpacks
- Rhino - Blazing (EXCLUSIVE Legendary)
- Rhino - Mr. Attitude (EXCLUSIVE Legendary)
- Rhino - Sharpened (EXCLUSIVE Legendary)

Disco Balls
800 Disco Balls - Disco Balls are Splitgate's in-game currency where you can purchase Armor skins, Weapon skins, Jetpack skins, Portal skills, Emotes, Sprays, and MORE!
1144680.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 罗马尼亚语, 俄语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 土耳其语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
